text: Now there was a man named Elkanah who was from Ramathaim-zophim 1:1 Or from Ramathaim, a Zuphite; see LXX and 1 Chronicles 6:26 and 35. in the hill country of Ephraim. He was the son of Jeroham, the son of Elihu,1:1 Elihu is also called Eliab and Eliel; see 1 Chronicles 6:27 and 34. the son of Tohu, the son of Zuph, an Ephraimite.
